page.title: 03CROFTS
page.content: On my croft we grow potatoes,turnips and cabbages. These take up two fields. All my family help on the croft. When we have picked the vegetables we pack them in bags for storage. Most of our produce is used by my family but mum also takes some to sell in the shops nearby. My dad works during the day in Inverness. We also have animals on the croft. My favourite animals are two horses called Whisper and Dougal. I go riding about twice a week. We all help to look after the animals. We have fifteen hens, thirteen ducks and three goats. The eggs are collected every day. We keep some for ourselves and my mum gets orders from her friends for eggs. I like living on a croft because there are lots of places to play and I like animals.
